website_summaries.verdict: If you've got a lot of trees to manage, this gas-powered tool is a fine choice.
pros: The high-performance motor and excellent reach allow you to tackle any pruning or lopping task
Numerous attachments offer great versatility, though they come at an additional cost

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Did something I don't normally don't do. Bought this item due to the low price. Received it & put it together. Rope would not pull to start it. It's now been in the repair shop for three weeks & I still don't have it back. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing components of order
customer_reviews.text: I received the pruner but it was missing the trimmer and chain reshaping file guide as advertised on Amazon. Poulan was of no help in resolving the problem. They said since it was Amazon there was no telling who made have opened the box before I got it. The way the equipment was packed there would be no room for anything other then the basic poll chain saw and extensions. What are YOU going to do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pollina

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your time or
customer_reviews.text: Broke first time using it. Do not waste your time or money
customer_reviews.author: EH

customer_reviews.title: Please don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: It lasted for 3 cutting and now its frozen up, yep, had exactly the right oil/gas mix! Its not been used but 3 times! Of course being bought in june of 2017 its out of warranty, well there won't be a next time with Poulan. What a piece of crap!
customer_reviews.author: Robert71457🚴🏋🖖

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Start and Keep Running
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box hard to start and does not want to keep running. It acts as if it has a dirty carburetor even though it is brand new. Amazon will not accept returns for this so I am stuck with a piece of junk that needs to be worked on every time I want to use it. Save your money and buy a different manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective saw, not returnable, repair takes weeks
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had paid attention to the other reviewers who received a defective Poulan saw from Amazon; when I unboxed mine and discovered that it did not run, I was surprised to learn that Amazon would not replace it or refund my money. So much for the Amazon satisfaction guarantee... Poulan's warranty repair would take weeks, so I had to buy another one (but it was NOT a Poulan, and it was NOT from Amazon)
customer_reviews.author: B Hays

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Poulan is one of the best brands of chain saws in the world. I really like the '3-section' pole. It gives you a more versatile product. I've owned a much larger Poulan chain saw for about 15 years now, and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: sailman2

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I bought this awhile back, and have been delighted with it. Just spent 4 hrs cutting limbs and bamboo along a fence line, and it did what I bought it for. Just about all my gas powered yard tools are now Poulan.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: The Poulan pole saw has worked great for pruning limbs from several trees
customer_reviews.text: The Poulan pole saw has worked great for pruning limbs from several trees. I have found that the saw doesn't reach high enough as I really need but a saw with that capability is too cost prohibitive. The saw has worked well for every tree limb I have used it to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Shockency Sr

customer_reviews.title: Runs good, not as powerful as other 25cc saws I ...
customer_reviews.text: Runs good, not as powerful as other 25cc saws I have used. Does cut clean as long as you do not apply to much pressure. Using weight of saw and slight pressure will prevent saw from stalling.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie Villescas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use mine all the time. I love how easy it is to. I'm short and this is amazing with the extension.
customer_reviews.author: corey owens

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this saw would never crank when my husband got it out of the box. After calling customer service, their only troubleshooting tool was to let it sit for half and hour. Still nothing. We returned it and will purchase another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: This is a work horse ! I trimmed 4 acre of oaks trees in no time .
customer_reviews.author: Goose Geeslin

customer_reviews.title: Always look at where power tools are made before buying. eBay has filtered out a lot of China junk.
customer_reviews.text: Expected it to have a little more power, but what we have here which seams to be the norm with Amazon. Another fine Chinese Product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard D. Will

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this pole saw, makes the job of cutting low branches a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Worked great! Needed something to cut a tree off a ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Needed something to cut a tree off a deck and yard trees. It was perfect and still working!
customer_reviews.author: SaritaF

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! Cutting down the overgrown tree limbs along driveway has been a breeze. Hardest part has been dragging the branches away.
customer_reviews.author: DebS

customer_reviews.title: But  it cuts  well
customer_reviews.text: The pole saw was a little shaky the parts on the kill switch was lose
customer_reviews.author: Talmadge st

customer_reviews.title: I expect good stuff, I get good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It's Poulan, I expect good stuff, I get good stuff... thanks.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought for trimming out a tree stand
customer_reviews.author: Vikings1

customer_reviews.title: JUST THE TICKET FOR STORM CLEANUP
customer_reviews.text: We've had three severe storms in my area in less than four months. This is just what I needed to cut storm debris into manageable chunks for disposal. The unit assembled really easily and started right up. Runs smoothly once you get it warmed up. The extra extension bar is too much unless you have a real need for it. Great for light-duty use.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: A little heavy and awkward but very easy assembly, starting and function. Trimmed over 25 Crepe myrtals and two large pine trees on same blade. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Fatherof4boys

customer_reviews.title: ... did not run correctly out of the box not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: No not at all it did not run correctly out of the box not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great saw and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great saw, does the job, starts all the time, powerful. Recommend, keeping oil tank full on saw head. Would recommend this saw.
customer_reviews.author: JBR Property Maintenance

product_meta.title: Poulan Pro PR25PS, 8 in. 25cc 2-Cycle Gas Pole Saw
product_meta.description: The PR25PS pole saw features a 25cc, 2 stroke engine with an 8" bar and a 3' extension for a 12' reach. Included accessories: shoulder strap. Poulan Pro trimmers boast features that ensure there's a unit perfect for every job. Our attachment capable trimmers, with Pro-Link, are designed to accept 6 optional attachments that make them even more versatile. From standard trimming to blowing, tilling, hedge trimming, edging, brushcutting and even tree pruning.
feature_bullets: SureFire Fuel Delivery System. Easy as..Prime, Choke and Pull
Effortless Pull Starting - Spring assisted starter system for ease of starting
Auto return stop switch automatically resets to the ON position for easier starting
Air Purge removes air from carburetor and fuel system for easy starting
Detachable shaft, tooless coupler separates shaft for easy transport and storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
